Description.Details: In an Attempt to Improve LRM's, Scientists applied a somewhat ancient Technique, remodelling the Warhead into a Shaped Charge, does it loose the Majority of its Destructive Potential for the Ability to Punch through nearly any Armor on the Modern Battlefield.Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: LRM Ammo
